message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts a remarkable value of $15000 to me but also comes with a range of features that could potentially be invaluable to you. Considering its quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $14500. I believe this price reflects both the intrinsic value of the product and provides you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special. I look forward to your consideration.
